x x x-ma rabû x+x x x x x x x+x mūdî emūqu x x x x x emūqu ašapparakka x x x x x-ti ana šarri bēlīya x x x x x x emūqu ana Bab-bitqa x x x x x-nu šû u {LU₂}GAL-x x x x x x+x-a-ni-i ipallahū x+x x x x x x x mādūtu ultu pāni x x x x x x ultu Babili ana pānīya x x x imaqqutūna Babilaya x x x x x Marduk-apla-iddina ultu x+x x x x x x innabbitū enna x x x x x x x+x x ša sakāp nakrī x x x x x x x x akī x x x x x x x
